ygData.subject: Re: Root-breaking and Selo
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The reason they re trying to eliminate this is because in an alternate form, lots of things that would normally attack you won t.  I ran into this bug with
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 8 Aug 1999, Melaniel wrote:
>
> Do you remember a recent patch that changed Treeform so druids
> couldn't move while as a tree? Well hold onto your drums but Selo's
> breaks the tree's roots, and the lovely druids can start being
> wandering trees again.
>
> Not sure if people have mentioned this already, but it sure caused a
> stir in East Commons when me and my sis were roaming around and I had
> this big tree chasing after me!!
>
> Anyone taking odds that this will get changed in a patch coming soon
> to a computer near you?

The reason they're trying to eliminate this is because in an
alternate form, lots of things that would normally attack you
won't. I ran into this bug with my enchanter - accidently
found a way to move with minor illusion up despite the latest
fixes. I was running around as a bed and *only* the things I
attacked would attack me back. It was like having a permanent
form of invisibility that never went down. Even griffins and
hill giants left me alone.

Yes, it's been /bugged.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
